dtxrd package¶

author:Stanislav Stoupin
email:<sstoupin@gmail.com>

Programs to support X-ray diffraction experiments

Provides¶

  • dtxrd : dynamical x-ray diffraction calculator
  • rcpeak : plot and calculate parameters of a reflectivity curve
  • rctopo : x-ray rocking curve image calculator (for a series of hdf4 CCD snapshots)
  • seehdf : hdf4 image data viewer
  • specscan : extract individual scans from a file generated by SPEC
  • throughput : calculate throughput of a multicrystal configuration

Requires¶

Numpy:http://numpy.org
Scipy:http://scipy.org
Matplotlib:http://matplotlib.org

This documentation built March 07, 2014.
